sdata.e: Halley's Comet comes round once every eighty years.

sdata.e: They believed it necessary to have great contests every four years.

sdata.j: このまま↑行↑↓い↓くと、５↑年↑↓|ねん↓↑後↑↓ご|↓↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓が↑衰退↑↓すいたい↓しているのは、↑火↑↓ひ↓を↑見↑↓み↓るより↑明↑↓あき↓らかである。
sdata.e: If we continue like this, it's as clear as day that the Japan of five years on will be in decline.

sdata.e: A year after saying those words, she succumbed to the illness she had been fighting.

sdata.e: In Japan, due partly to the fitness boom that began from around 2000, 'dumbbell training' also appeared as a way to exercise at home.

sdata.j: 1989↑年↑↓ねん↓の↑1月↑↓いちがつ↓に↑昭和↑↓しょうわ↓↑天皇↑↓てんのう↓が↑崩御↑↓ほうぎょ↓されたので、↑年号↑↓|ねんご|う↓が↑昭和↑↓しょうわ↓から↑平成↑↓へいせい↓に↑変↑↓か↓わりました。
sdata.e: The emperor passed away in January of 1989. Therefore, the name of the era changed from Showa to Heisei.
